thread.title: Gael García Bernal takes aim at Trump's wall - LA Times
thread.title_full: Gael García Bernal takes aim at Trump's wall - LA Times

author: Nardine Saad
title: Gael García Bernal takes aim at Trump's wall - LA Times
text:
Oscars 2017 live updates: Viola Davis and Mahershala Ali win supporting acting awards Feb. 26, 2017, 7:26 p.m. 
The Academy Awards started with a win for Mahershala Ali, who played a compassionate drug dealer in "Moonlight." Viola Davis won for her role a housewife married to an overbearing man. 
“La La Land” came into the night with 14 Oscar nominations including actor, actress, director and picture. That ties the record shared with "All About Eve" and "Titanic." Also in the running tonight is "Arrival" and "Moonlight," each with eight nominations.
